hookDescription: Manages the root state for a tooltip.

animated.description: Whether the tooltip can animate. Useful to disable in tests.

closeDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds until the tooltip content is closed.

defaultOpen.description: If true, the tooltip will be open by default. Use when uncontrolled.

delay.description: The delay in milliseconds until the tooltip content is opened.

delayType.description: The delay type to use. rest means the delay represents how long the user's cursor must rest on the trigger before the tooltip content is opened. hover means the delay represents how long to wait once the user's cursor has entered the trigger.

followCursorAxis.description: Determines which axis the tooltip should follow the cursor on.

hoverable.description: Whether you can move from the trigger to the tooltip without it closing.

keepMounted.description: If true, the tooltip will remain mounted in the DOM.

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when the tooltip is requested to be opened or closed.

open.description: If true, the tooltip will be open. Use when controlled.

popupEl.description: The popup element. Store in state.

triggerEl.description: The trigger element. Store in state.

getRootPopupProps.description: Prop getter to spread root props on the popup element.

getTriggerProps.description: Prop getter to spread props on the trigger element.

instantType.description: The type of instant phase the tooltip is in to remove animations.

setMounted.description: Sets the mounted state of the tooltip.

setOpen.description: Sets the open state of the tooltip.

transitionStatus.description: The transition status of the tooltip.
